entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
